snippet.title: Ravva and the Cyclops Curse - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Unleash your summoning powers to defeat the Cyclops Lord! Along with four unusual companions, you must journey through a dangerous land to save your mother, who suffered a terrible curse. A challenging adventure awaits!  Available on:
• Steam http://bit.ly/ravva-steam 
• Ichi http://bit.ly/ravva-ichiio 
• Kartridge http://bit.ly/ravva-kartridge
